name: Cisco | IOS | Network | NTP | System Clock Adjusted #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %SYS-6-CLOCKUPDATE: System clock has been updated from 13:11:01 MSK Mon Nov 7 2011 to 14:11:01 MSK Mon Nov 7 2011, configured from console by admin on vty0 (192.168.100.253).

patterns.value_re: %SYS-6-CLOCKUPDATE: System clock has been updated from .+ to .+, configured from console by \S+ on vty\d+ \((?P<server_address>\S+)\)\.$
